# [FEAT] Custom Report Builder

## Labels
`reporting`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement a custom report builder for creating tailored analytics reports.

## Requirements

### Report Builder
- Drag-and-drop interface
- Metrics selection
- Dimension selection
- Filter configuration
- Visualization options
- Report preview

### Data Sources
- Tickets
- Users
- Organizations
- Agents
- Articles
- Chats
- Calls
- Custom objects

### Metrics Types
- Count metrics (tickets, replies)
- Time metrics (response time, resolution time)
- Calculated metrics (custom formulas)
- Comparative metrics (vs. previous period)

### Visualization Options
- Tables
- Charts (line, bar, pie, area)
- Pivot tables
- Summary cards
- Heat maps
- Scatter plots

### Report Management
- Save reports
- Report folders
- Share reports
- Schedule reports
- Report versioning
- Report templates

### Export Options
- PDF export
- Excel/CSV export
- Email delivery
- API access
- Embed options

## Zendesk Reference
Users can build custom reports for unique insights with drill-down capabilities to understand trends and performance at a granular level.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Report builder interface works
- [ ] All data sources available
- [ ] Visualizations render correctly
- [ ] Reports savable and shareable
- [ ] Export options functional
